channel.title: United Stares + Christianity
channel.description: Why is it that in the US, if you're not a christian like the majority of the population criticizes you for not being a Christian. Most people look at me and assume I'm an atheist or a fuckin satanist. I tell people i go to church, and they are like "wow, what the fuck." I am not a Christian because as i matured i saw through the illusion of the Christian church, looked at other monotheistic religions and became Agnostic because they are just different strains of the same based religion. But then there are little fuckers called "Catholics" who think they are the only right religion, i mean this is just bullshit. No matter what, it's like if you aren't a[i] Christian[/i], you are a wrongful person. I'm basically tired of the churches bullshit, one day i looked at my younger brothers papers he got from Sunday school (he's 6/7 years old at the time) and i found a paper that basically said "If i'm not a a full Christian and accept Jesus as my savior, i don't have a pure heart." I can't wait for the anti-christ to arise **cough cough Obama cough cough** and show everybody how much of a dumbass they are for making Christianity an essential for life and if you see it from my point of view, that's exactly what is happening. It's not even that most of the time, if you're even associated with something "unholy" you get criticized for it like no fucking other.

item.title: United Stares + Christianity
item.dc:creator: @PaulT PaulT
item.description:
@PaulT wrote:

thefalloffuckingtroy.:

they are for making Christianity an essential for life and if you see it from my point of view, that’s exactly what is happening. It’s not even that most of the time, if you’re even associated with something “unholy” you get criticized for it like no fucking other.

“They” just want you to accept a label. If you want to be a real rebel, accept the label.

Tell “Them” Jesus is talking to you, and he’s telling you terrible things. Make sure everybody is aware of how the Jesus-voice in your head is bent on destruction and murder. Steal things from the “Christians”, sell them, and then give the money to the poor. Leave a note in place of the stolen item telling the previous owner that “Jesus told you to do it”. Constantly make elaborate prophecies about how the “Christians” in your life are going to be tortured in hell for every single sin they commit. Read “The Divine Comedy” by Dante for tips. Make sure everybody is ashamed of having fun and doing the things they like to do.

Read full topic

item.title: United Stares + Christianity
item.dc:creator: @Squigglyo Squigglyo
item.description:
@Squigglyo wrote:

[quote=“R.I.P RSC, post:17, topic:253831”][quote author=Squigglyo link=topic=335337.msg2615207#msg2615207 date=1230989492]

Christians are true evil, altough evil doesn’t exist. Therefore, Christianity is fake.

See what I did there?

try as i might, i cant find a hole in your logic
[/quote]

That’s what I thought

But to be serious: Christians see themselves as superior. Sure, there are some that think otherwise, but all in all they do.

I see the bible as what it is: A library. A library of philosophical stories. And that’s all it is. Bible comes from biblios, which means library.[/quote]

you sir may possibly the the smartest person ive quoted all night.

That is exactly the way i see the bible
